nodes.text: Christophsis's moon was a moon that orbited the planet Christophsis. Its light-colored surface was marked by large fissures. During the Battle of Christophsis, a Galactic Republic naval task force hid behind the moon as General Obi-Wan Kenobi and Anakin Skywalker planned their next move.
The Essential Atlas, released before The Clone Wars: Season Two stated that Christophsis didn't have a moon.
